nodes.text: Ruvehnimaal was a male Kadas'sa'Nikto living on Nar Shaddaa during the Galactic War who worked at Club Vertica Casino during a Soovada event. After determining that one of the guests was cheating, he asked a trusted associate to identify the cheater so that the bouncer Grenkk could kick them out.
Ruvehnimaal appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne as a Nightlife event quest giver.
